DOC.brief_title: Urinary Sexual Function Before After Surgical Decompression Cervical Myelopathy
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator enroll consecutive cohort cervical myelopathy schedule take surgical decompression cervical spinal cord , age 25 65 . The exams patient include following - JOA ( Japanese Orthopaedic Association ) Scores cervical myelopathy - VAS ( Visual Analog Scale ) pain score - IPSS ( International Prostate Symptom Score ) IIEF ( International Index Erectile Function ) male patient - FSFI ( Female Sexual Function Index ) UDI ( Urinary Distress Inventory ) female patient - Bladder compliance , Detrusor leak point pressure , Peak detrusor pressure - Rigidity activity unit penis
